alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lackawanna and southeastern Wyoming Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Falls, or near Tunkhannock, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Falls, Old Forge, Taylor, Dickson City, Clarks Summit, Duryea, Clarks Green, Glenburn and Osterhout. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 194. Interstate 476 between 122 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
